channel.title: ofxAppUpdater Appcast
channel.description: You can find the most recent changes from ofxAppUpdater Addon at this file (including changes from UpdateManager App).

item.title: ofxAppUpdater release v.1.0.1
item.description: [new] GitHub wiki // [new] UpdateManager and example_UpdateManager, an app to outsource the update process. // [new] ofxAppcast class to parse appcast files. // [new] ofxAutoUpdate class and example_autoUpdate // [internal] Added release_storage directory, added appcast rss feed to check if a new version is available. //

item.title: ofxAppUpdater release v.1.0.0
item.description: [change] versioninfo.xml to Appcast RSS // [improved] Download, and unzip. // [internal] Changes at init method (because of apcast.xml contains variables that we set in previous version at versioninfo.xml) // [internal] Test examples and methods // [internal] Added release_storage directory, added appcast rss feed to check if a new version is available. //

item.title: ofxAppUpdater release v.0.1.1
item.description: [new] Create GitHub Repository. [new] Added addon src directory, ofxAppUpdater class. First example sourcecode + Xcode project.
